name: 마녀와 추리의 윤무곡 v1
description: A high-level reasoning game based on the world of 'Umineko When They Cry'. Players, as the 'Human' side, must uncover the truth of a mystery against an AI Game Master, the 'Witch'. The core of the game is not just finding the answer, but a fierce logical battle over the definition of 'truth'.
